properties.title: Command line tools for load testing Code Generation

section.name: SoapUIToolRunner
section.p: The SoapUIToolRunner can be used to any of the integrated Code Generation tools from the command line as they have been configured in soapUI.

The runner is defined in the com.eviware.soapui.tools.SoapUIToolRunner class and takes the path to the soapUI project file containing the interface and tool-configuration to run. It has the following options:

tr.td: the interface for which the tool should be run
the tool(s) to run, a comma-separated list with the following tokens; axis1, axis2, dotnet, gsoap, jaxb, wstools, wsconsume, ora, wsi, wscompile, wsimport, cxf, xfire or xmlbeans
the soapui-settings.xml file to use (usually the one in the soapUI bin directory)
Sets project password for decryption if project is encrypted

section.p: The distribution contains a toolrunner.bat script for running tools from within the bin directory, for example;
will run all the axis 1.X code-generation as previously defined within soapUI and produce the following output:
